page.title: 16HALTON HOLEGATE C.E. SCHOOL
page.content: Our school has 40 children,most of whom come from the village.There is no school bus.At the moment the Junior Class has 15 children,these are 2nd., 3rd.,and 4th.year juniors.Mr.Hornsby is their teacher;he is also the headmaster.In the mornings all our work is done in groups;for example there are 7 mathematics & 5 English groups.In the afternoon we usually work together on Art & Craft,Music, Games,etc. The younger class has 25 children;all the infants plus the 1st. year juniors are in this class.In the school we have a secretary,a dinner lady,and a caretaker. The main events in the school year are:Autumn Term: Special Harvest Festival Assembly, Christmas Carol Service and Concert. Spring Term:Spilsby Music Festival, Easter Assembly.Summer Term:Outings, Sports and Prize Giving Concert.
